title: News24.com | Bogus tip-off sends buses with Japanese workers back to Mozambican border
description: Police stopped four buses of Japanese citizens who were on their way to OR Tambo International Airport from Mozambique, after a 'whistleblower' contacted authorities and incorrectly reported that they might be Chinese nationals who were prohibited from flying.
content: Police stopped four buses of Japanese citizens who were on their way to OR Tambo International Airport from Mozambique, after a "whistleblower" contacted authorities and incorrectly reported that they might be Chinese nationals who were prohibited from flying… [+2890 chars]
